comprehensive enough yet (so please submit!), and there’s room for people to create
curated/annotated/opinionated forks of this list.

* First wave of Devcon4 ticket sales at 8am PDT on July 9th.
First wave of Devcon4 ticket sales at 8am PDT on July 9th.
* Why are gas fees so high right now ? Because an exchange encouraged spamming the
network for listings. So scam tokens are spamming hard. New ATH on daily transaction
fees . by a lot.
Why are gas fees so high right now ? Because an exchange encouraged spamming the
* Proposal and discussion of improved fee markets
Proposal and discussion of improved fee markets
Live on mainnet
* SONM is live on mainnet
SONM is live on mainnet
* Aventus ticketing is also live on mainnet
Aventus ticketing is also live on mainnet
* Liquidity Network is live on mainnet and you can try it here . Jeff Coleman
tweetstorm says it is a version of Plasma Cash and thinks he sees a possible operator
attack. Hopefully they verify their code imminently.
Liquidity Network is live on mainnet and you can try it here . Jeff Coleman tweetstorm
says it is a version of Plasma Cash and thinks he sees a possible operator attack.
Hopefully they verify their code imminently.
Governance and Standards
* EIP1186 : eth_getProof
EIP1186 : eth_getProof
* EIP1187 : Gas cost reduction for ECADD, ECMUL and ECPAIRING. similar to eip1108
EIP1187 : Gas cost reduction for ECADD, ECMUL and ECPAIRING. similar to eip1108
* ERC1190 : non fungible royalty token
ERC1190 : non fungible royalty token
* Lots of discussion on ERC1155 gaming NFTs
Lots of discussion on ERC1155 gaming NFTs
* Kelsen - governance dapp with some demos live on Rinkeby
Kelsen - governance dapp with some demos live on Rinkeby
* Phil Daian: On-Chain Vote Buying and the Rise of Dark DAOs , followed up a day later
by Vote Buying, On-Chain Governance, and Quadratic Plutocracy . The future of onchain
coinvoting looks bleak.
Phil Daian: On-Chain Vote Buying and the Rise of Dark DAOs , followed up a day later by
Vote Buying, On-Chain Governance, and Quadratic Plutocracy . The future of onchain

If you appreciate this newsletter, thank ConsenSys
This newsletter is made possible by ConsenSys , which is perpetually hiring if you’re
interested.
Editorial control is 100% me. If you’re unhappy with editorial decisions, feel free to
tweet at me.
Shameless self-promotion
Most of what I link to I tweet first: @evan_van_ness
Week in Ethereum News
